en.purpose: To assess the binocular and monocular visual acuity.
en.use:
Use to measure the visual acuity by holding the Snellen Chart 4 feet (1.2 m) from the patient, and select the lowest line that the patient can read correctly with each eye independently. 

Interpretation: 
Line 1 - 20/200 visual acuity 
Line 2 - 20/100 visual acuity 
Line 3 - 20/70 visual acuity 
Line 4 - 20/50 visual acuity 
Line 5 - 20/40 visual acuity 
Line 6 - 20/30 visual acuity 
Line 7 - 20/25 visual acuity 
Line 8, 9, 19, 11 - 20/20 visual acuity
en.misuse: Not to be used as a replacement for in-office testing.
